column1: 83039729$Grandmaster of the Six Samurai$Unlimited$EARTH$[Warrior/Effect]$$$$$5$2100$800$$$$You can only control 1 "Grandmaster of the Six Samurai". If you control a "Six Samurai" monster
column2: you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card in your possession is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: Target 1 "Six Samurai" monster in your GY; add that target to your hand.$Supports archetypes /Six Samurai$$Activates from your hand/Activates if destroyed by card effect/Returns from your Graveyard to your hand$Unclassified/Trigger$
